description.brief: CHOMP - Covariant Hamiltonian Optimization for Motion Planning

package.description:
CHOMP is a motion planner based on trajectory optimization. It generates smooth, collision-free trajectories. For technical, algorithmic details, please refer to:
"CHOMP: Gradient Optimization Techniques for Efficient Motion Planning". Nathan Ratliff, Matthew Zucker, J. Andrew Bagnell anhd Siddhartha Srinivasa. IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation, May 2009.
